changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE TerraExecutor ( id BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY NOT NULL, -- primary key workspace TEXT NOT NULL, -- the fully-qualified 'Namespace/Name' of the Terra workspace to execute workflows in method_configuration TEXT NOT NULL, -- the fully-qualified 'Namespace/Name' of the method configuration used to create submissions method_configuration_version TEXT NOT NULL, -- the version of the method configuration details TEXT NOT NULL, -- the identifier of the executor details table from_source TEXT NOT NULL, -- mapping of how to coerce the output of source to executor in serialized EDN CONSTRAINT TERRAEXECUTOR_PKEY PRIMARY KEY (id) )
